definition: sb who is romantically involved with sb already in a committed relationship/the other woman/the other man/third person/third party (in dispute)/disinterested party/number three in a list
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
surname San
three/3

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: In this case the proforma invoice is required for a third party.
sentences.chinese: 这里述及的形式发票是为第三者索取的。

sentences.english: If they did, they would not have been tempted to commit adultery.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们知道，就不会被诱惑，成为第三者了。

sentences.english: Is "the Possible Experience" also "the Third Thing" of Synthetic Judgment a Priori ? --H. J.
sentences.chinese: 可能经验也是先天综合判断的第三者吗？

sentences.english: The at last ought to marry the important hero , be a dream because of having had 'the third person' Duo A quietly.
sentences.chinese: 最后宜静没有嫁给大雄，是因为有了第三者哆啦A梦。

sentences.english: I gar there must be a third person involved.
sentences.chinese: 我猜测一定是有第三者插足。

sentences.english: A slander is not actionable unless it is published to a third person.
sentences.chinese: 诽谤只有向第三者传播才能起诉。

sentences.english: Depression can be like a third party that comes between couples and creates a sense of hopelessness.
sentences.chinese: 抑郁症可以像夫妻间的第三者，并创造出绝望情绪。

sentences.english: It'seldom happened that a third party ever witnessed any of these prodigies.
sentences.chinese: 这类壮举发生的时候，难得有第三者在场目睹过。

sentences.english: Zhai says Sudan had agreed not to transfer Chinese-made weapons to third parties.
sentences.chinese: 翟隽说，苏丹同意不把中国制造的武器转让给第三者。

sentences.english: Please complete the following authorization form if you wish to authorise a third party to collect the securities.
sentences.chinese: 如阁下授权第三者代取股票，请填写以下授权表格。

sentences.english: Bing and argue, honor with customers, we appealed to grasp bitterness toward refers to a third party.
sentences.chinese: 秉又与客户争执，荣劝解秉，秉向荣诉苦指有第三者。

sentences.english: Their marriage has broken just because of the other man.
sentences.chinese: 他们婚姻的破裂仅仅因为有第三者插足。

sentences.english: Some star has come into frequent/close contact with the other woman.
sentences.chinese: 湡某位明星最近和第三者有密切联系。

sentences.english: I gather there must be a third person involved.
sentences.chinese: 我猜测一定是有第三者插足。

sentences.english: So I left, so that I wouldn't be in the way.
sentences.chinese: 于是我离开了，我不愿成为碍事的第三者。

sentences.english: This application must be accompanied by a copy of the third party operator's valid Business Registration Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 申请表必须附同第三者经营的有效的商业登记证副本。

definition: extramarital affair
to squeeze in/to step in/to take part/to step between (two persons in a relationship)
see 婚外情[hun1 wai4 qing2]
extramarital
mistress/the other woman (coll.)/grade 3 in elementary school
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
extramarital affair
matrimony/wedding/marriage/CL:樁|桩[zhuang1],次[ci4]
married man
to do the splits (gymnastics)/(Tw) two-timing (in romantic relationships)/Taiwan pr. [pi1 tui3]
to divorce/divorced from (one's spouse)
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
to have a foot in both camps/to have a bet each way/to be having an affair
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to rob sb of sth they cherish (idiom)
lover/sweetheart
